element.name: Ouroboros: Quantum Resonance
element.description: Approved special items for the Quantum Resonance campaign.

p.i: Prerequisite: The ability to cast at least one spell

description.p: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat, learning techniques that grant you the following benefits:

ul.li: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.
You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands.

When a hostile creature’s movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.
Being within 5 feet if an enemy doesn't impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls with Spells.

sheet.description: You gain the following benefits: • You have advantage on Constitution saves to maintain your concentration on a spell. • You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands. • You can cast a spell as an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature. • Being within 5 feet if an enemy doesn't impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls with Spells.
